summary.span: 处理用于验证活动的验证约束。

span.span: Handles the validation constraint that is used for validating an activity.

span.span: Adds a validation error to a list of run-time validation errors that are attached to the execution context.

summary.span: 由派生类实现时，使用指定的本机活动和验证上下文来验证指定的对象。

span.span: When implemented by a derived class, validates the specified object using the specified native activity and validation contexts.
